member.name: T:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions
member.summary: Static class providing various extension methods for the class.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToMd5Hash(System.String)
member.summary: String extention method which converts the input string to hash array.
member.param: The string on which the method is invoked.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: String extention method which ckecks whether the input string contains a true-like value.
member.param: The string on which the method is invoked.
member.returns: Returns whether the string contains true-like value.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToShort(System.String)
member.summary: String extention method which tries to convert the input string into Int16 representation.
member.param: The string on which the method is invoked.
member.returns: Returns variable of type Int16 if the string is a number, null - otherwise.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToInteger(System.String)
member.summary: String extention method which tries to convert the input string into Int32 representation.
member.param: The string on which the method is invoked.
member.returns: Returns variable of type Int32 if the string is a number, null - otherwise.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToLong(System.String)
member.summary: String extention method which tries to convert the input string into Int64 representation.
member.param: The string on which the method is invoked.
member.returns: Returns variable of type Int64 if the string is a number, null - otherwise.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToDateTime(System.String)
member.summary: String extention method which tries to convert the input string into DateTime representation.
member.param: The string on which the method is invoked.
member.returns: Returns variable of type DateTime if the string can be parsed, null - otherwise.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.CapitalizeFirstLetter(System.String)
member.summary: String extention method which capitalizes the first letter of the input string.
member.param: The string on which the method is invoked.
member.returns: Returns the input string with capital first letter.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetStringBetween(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: String extention method which returns the substring between two given strings.
member.param: The string on which the method is invoked.
Start of the substring.
End of the substring.
Index to start search from (optional).
member.returns: Returns the substring between startString and endString. If the substrings are not cointained in the input string - returns an empty string.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertCyrillicToLatinLetters(System.String)
member.summary: String extention method which converts the cyrillic letters from the input string into their latin representation.
member.param: The string on which the method is invoked.
member.returns: Returns a converted cyrillic text to latin one.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertLatinToCyrillicKeyboard(System.String)
member.summary: String extention method which converts the latin letters from the input string into their cyrillic representation.
member.param: The string on which the method is invoked.
member.returns: Returns a converted latin text to cyrillic one.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidUsername(System.String)
member.summary: String extention method which replaces invalid symbols in the input string with an empty string and converts a valid filename.
member.param: The string on which the method is invoked.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidLatinFileName(System.String)
member.summary: String extention method which replaces invalid symbols in the input string with an empty string and converts a valid filename.
member.param: The string on which the method is invoked.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFirstCharacters(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: String extention method which returns first N characters of the input string.
member.param: The string on which the method is invoked.
The count of the characters to be returned.
member.returns: Returns the beginning of the input string as a substring with lenght equals to charsCount. If the charsCount is greater than the lenght of the input string, returns whole string.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: String extention method which returns the extention of a given filename represented as a string.
member.param: The filename represented as a string on which the method is invoked.
member.returns: Returns the file extention of the filename. If the input string is null or whitespace, or the filename has no extension, returns an empty string.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToContentType(System.String)
member.summary: String extention method which returns the content type of a file determined by its extension.
member.param: The extension of a filename represented as a string on which the method is invoked.
member.returns: Returns the content type if known, "application/octet-stream" - otherwise.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToByteArray(System.String)
member.summary: String extention method which converts the input string to a byte array.
member.param: The string on which the method is invoked.
member.returns: Returns a byte array of the input string
